name: Bible Reference Game: TV Edition
description:
The Bible Reference Game is a fun way to learn the Bible by matching Scripture verses with their references.

- Play alone, or with up to 7 of your friends and family.

- Covers every verse in the King James Bible with 3 levels of difficulty. Plus, choose to have your questions come from the Old Testament, New Testament or Both.

- Optionally view the entire chapter to better understand the context.

- Your score is calculated after each game, and statistics have been built in to track your performance across every book of the Bible.

- Verses are randomly loaded providing an almost endless number of game variations.

It's time to play the Bible Reference Game: TV Edition!
